title: Blue cheese and honey bruschetta

default: 85g/3oz Lanark Blue cheese, or other blue cheese

steps: Heat a griddle pan until hot. Drizzle the oil over the slices of bread and griddle on both sides until golden-brown. Remove from the pan and place onto a serving plate.
Crumble the cheese over each slice of bread and drizzle over the honey. Serve garnished with chopped parsley and chives.
